summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the functionality of Certbot's internal display utilities, including ACME error description formatting, timed user input handling, string parenthesis insertion, list parsing, domain list summarization, and line-wrapping behavior.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of user interface components used during certificate issuance, ensuring clear error messages, reliable input processing, and proper formatting of displayed information for a better user experience.
